remarks: Binary relation expressing the dual modular pair property.  This version has a weaker constraint than ~ dmdbr .  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dmdbr2 $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH* B <-> A. x e. CH ( B C_ x -> ( x i^i ( A vH B ) ) C_ ( ( x i^i A ) vH B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
